prompts: Create a powerful ground-type Pokemon with a rugged body and a large horn.
Show me a sturdy Pokemon that can withstand any attack with its tough exterior.
Imagine a rock-type creature that thrives in mountainous terrains and has impressive strength.
Design a Pokemon that embodies resilience, featuring a strong build and a fierce expression.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a dinosaur, with a heavy body and a determined gaze.
Give me a unique Pokemon that can dig through the earth effortlessly and has a rocky appearance.
Make a Pokemon that looks intimidating, with sharp features and a muscular form.
